name: Olive Tweed and Tartan 'Dr' Bag...
description:
This Particular design was christened the "Dr" bag as, during the early design stages, it was intended to be much more like a traditional apothecary bag and, although the design changed dramatically, the name stuck.

Here, a beautiful handwoven, pure wool, olive green tweed has been combined with a fabulous multi-coloured tartan.

The tweed is produced in a small family run mill in Scotland in small batches and is of the most exceptional quality. Combine this with the richly colourful, pure wool tartan base and soft green worsted weight wool lining, and you have a bag made of the most ridiculously luxurious materials.

Measuring approx. 11" x 12" and 4" deep, the "Dr" bag has a firm plastic base, and metal twist lock and feet. The interior pocket is closed with a YKK zip. The faux tortoise shell handles are hard, scratch resistant polyester acrylic and have an opening of approx. 5" from the top of the bag, to the top of the inside of the handle. To add further enhancement, they have been attached with tabs of rich yellow Italian lambskin leather.

All my bags are entirely handmade by me in a smoke free, and pet free studio. They are double-stitched throughout, and triple stitched at any stress points. To keep their shape, they are all fully interfaced with ultra thick interfacing, and each comes packaged in its own protective cotton dust cover.

Every single bag we create is a one off design, never to be repeated in exactly the same way again. We love the creative challenge this affords us and knowing that each of our customers gets something totally unique to them!

name: Yellow/Brown Shetland Rosette Tweed and Yellow Leather 'Dr' Bag...
description:
This Particular design was christened the "Dr" bag as, during the early design stages, it was intended to be much more like a traditional apothecary bag and, although the design changed dramatically, the name stuck.

Here, one of our most prized finds - a stunningly beautiful yellow and mink shetland rosette tweed, beautifully woven for unusual scale and stylish colour combinations, is carefully paired with beautiful soft toning buttery yellow Italian lambskin leather. The clear handle and silver hardware add further contemporary touches to this most stunning of bags that would make for an amazing focal point on any arm...

The tweed is produced in a small family run mill in Scotland in small batches and is of the most exceptional quality. Combine this with the deep brown, pure wool lining and the Italian buttersoft leather, and you have a bag made of the most ridiculously luxurious materials that makes a statement both outside and in.

Measuring approx. 11" x 12" and 4" deep, the "Dr" bag has a firm plastic base, and metal twist lock and feet. The interior pocket is closed with a YKK zip. The stylish, clear, contemporary handles are hard, scratch resistant polyester acrylic and have an opening of approx. 5" from the top of the bag, to the top of the inside of the handle.

All my bags are entirely handmade by me in a smoke free, and pet free studio. They are double-stitched throughout, and triple stitched at any stress points. To keep their shape, they are all fully interfaced with ultra thick interfacing, and each comes packaged in its own protective cotton dust cover.

Every single bag we create is a one off design, never to be repeated in exactly the same way again. We love the creative challenge this affords us and knowing that each of our customers gets something totally unique to them!

name: Blue and Brown Tweed 'Vivienne' Bag...
description:
This particular design, with its luxuriant use of rich fabric, falling in to ripples and folds when worn, was originally inspired by the work of Vivienne Westwood and, as such, is known as, "The Vivienne".

Here, a beautiful handwoven, unbrushed mohair, blue and brown tweed has been combined with a fabulous grey and brown handwoven pure wool.

Both these tweeds are produced in a small family run mill in Scotland in small batches, and are of the most exceptional quality. The unbrushed mohair adds an interesting textural contrast and this, combined with the butterscotch toned chain handle, just screams luxury. The heavy weight cotton lining is printed with a stylized seagull design and ensures the bag is as hard-wearing as it is beautiful.

Measuring approx. 14" x 18", the "Vivienne" is a substantial, fashionably over-sized bag with a totally on trend shoulder strap. The bag closes with a metal twist lock in the flap closure, and a magnetic snap inside the bag for extra security. Each of the three pockets, two exterior and one interior, closes with a YKK zip. The chunky chain handle is scratch-resistant polyester acrylic, and adds drama and interest, without adding weight.

All my bags are entirely handmade by me in a smoke free, and pet free studio. They are double-stitched throughout, and triple stitched at any stress points. To keep their shape, they are all fully interfaced, in this case, with the same interface as used in winter-weight patchwork quilts, and each comes packaged in its own protective cotton dust cover.

Every single bag we create is a one off design, never to be repeated in exactly the same way again. We love the creative challenge this affords us and knowing that each of our customers gets something totally unique to them!
